Completion.List: "ALTER SESSION SET " "BEGIN END;" "COMMIT;" "CREATE OR REPLACE " "CREATE TABLE nombre( campo1 tipo1, campo2 tipo2);" "CREATE INDEX " "CREATE UNIQUE INDEX nombre ON tabla(campos)" "CREATE SEQUENCE " "CREATE SEQUENCE nombre MINVALUE valor START WITH valor INCREMENT BY valor;" "CREATE SYNONYM " "CREATE VIEW " "CURSOR nombre IS consulta;" "dbms_output.enable(" "dbms_output.put_line(" "DECLARE variables BEGIN cuerpo END;" "DELETE FROM" "DELETE FROM nombre WHERE condición;" "DROP INDEX " "DROP TABLE " "END IF;" "END;" "EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL;" "EXECUTE INMEDIATE " "FOR i IN 1..n LOOP END LOOP;" "FOR i IN nombre_de_cursor LOOP END LOOP;" "FOREIGN KEY" "FORMAT " "FORMAT A9" "FORMAT 99.99" "FUNCTION nombre(parámetros) RETURN tipo IS BEGIN END;" "GROUP BY " "IF THEN ELSE END IF;" "IF THEN ELSIF END IF;" "IF NOT " "INCREMENT BY " "INDEX " "INSERT " "INSERT INTO tabla VALUES(valores_separados_por_comas);" "LOCK TABLE tabla IN EXCLUSIVE MODE;" "ORDER BY " "PROCEDURE nombre(parámetros) IS BEGIN END;" "PROMPT mensaje" "RENAME nombre TO nuevo_nombre;" "ROLLBACK;" "ROWNUM < 10" "SELECT * FROM " "SELECT count( *) FROM " "SELECT table_name FROM tabs WHERE table_name LIKE '%%';" "SELECT campos FROM tabla WHERE condición ORDER BY campos;" "SET LINESIZE 1000" "SET PAGESIZE 5000" "SPOOL OFF" "SPOOL c:\aaa.txt" "TRUNCATE TABLE" "UNION ALL" "UPDATE tabla SET campo=valor, ... WHERE condicion;" "WHILE condicion LOOP END LOOP;"
